item.description:
NEO-SOUL THURSDAYS AT PEARL LOUNGE -

Bands and Comedy Each week at the #1 Urban Thursday Night in Connecticut.

3 Rooms, 2 DJ's, Live Bands, Comedy Shows & more!

PERFORMING AT NEO SOUL THURSDAYS Mr. "QWES" & The Cool . DO NOT MISS THIS SHOW ...THIS MAN IS UNBELIEVABLE....PERFORMING ALL THE NEO SOUL HITS....
RESERVATIONS FOR FREE BIRTHDAY PARTIES AND SOCIAL EVENTS CALL 203-444-2509. DJ ASTRO from NYC - IN THE MAIN ROOM.

Doors Open 8:30pm - EVERYONE FREE Before 9:30pm w/RSVP

TO RSVP for FREE Admission (you and friends)
text "Neo-Soul" to 203.444.2509

For questions, birthday celebrations, or info call Jason V. Watts 203.444.2509

Visit www.blackinct.com for full roster of Urban Events throughout Connecticut.

Neo-Soul Thursdays presented by Michael Sloan Promotions & www.blackinct.com
item.name: Neo-Soul Thursdays (Live Comedy/Live Bands)
